dialogues.text: Along the eastern shores of Azureal Island, you will find many scorpions. A man by the name of 'Crazy Cooper' lives nearby the forest edge.
Rumour has it, he was stung by a scorpion, but rather than the venom killing him, it drove him mad. He has become somewhat... unstable.
Quite the tragedy. He used to be a citizen of Port Azure. Now, he doesn't want to return and he lives out in the wild.
